title: 1923년 Sellers 사건
summary: 미국 Georgia, GA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Sellers. 판결일: 1923-03-06. 법원: Court of Appeals of Georgia.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: SELLERS v. State
**판결일**: 1923-03-06
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Georgia
**관할**: Georgia, GA

**판사**: Loke

## 변호인

Spence & Spence, F. E. Radensleben, for plaintiff in error., John A. Boykin, solicitor-general, E. A. Stephens, contra.

## 인용

- 30 Ga. App. 34

## 판결문 요약


Loke, J.
The indictment in this case charged the defendant with the offense of murder. The jury convicted him of voluntary manslaughter. The evidence amply authorized the defendant’s conviction, which has the approval of the trial judge. The sole assignment of error is upon the ground that the evidence does not *35authorize the verdict. It was not error to overrule the motion for a new trial.

Judgment affirmed.


Broyles, O. J., and Bloodworth, J., concur.

...
